title: Matteo Ghisolfi
text:
Matteo Ghisolfi (born 25 May 2002) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> for club <a href="U.S.%20Fiorenzuola%201922%20S.S.">Fiorenzuola</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a> debut for <a href="U.S.%20Cremonese">Cremonese</a> on 4 October 2020 in a game against <a href="A.C.%20Pisa%201909">Pisa</a>. He started the game and was substituted at half-time.
On 16 August 2021, he was loaned to <a href="U.S.%20Grosseto%201912">Grosseto</a>.
On 31 January 2022, Ghisolfi moved on a permanent basis to <a href="U.S.%20Fiorenzuola%201922%20S.S.">Fiorenzuola</a> and signed a contract until 30 June 2022.
